main event: On December 31, 1952, a B-36 pilot and crew sighted an unidentified object while flying at 55,000 feet over Ramey AFB, Puerto Rico.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 3 minutes before the object was lost from sight., The flying crew was on a training mission and reported no evasive action taken., The object was first spotted at the 10 o'clock position before moving to the 12 o'clock position., The visibility during the sighting was described as excellent., The investigation into the sighting was deemed to have potential intelligence value.
sighted object: an unidentified object in the sky
witness description: B-36 pilot and four crew members
